Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Enacts "Destini Smothers' law"; requires collaboration between law enforcement agencies in missing persons investigations and provides support for relatives of such missing persons
Summary: Enacts "Destini Smothers' law"; requires collaboration between law enforcement agencies in missing persons investigations; provides support for relatives of such missing persons.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to enacting "Destini Smothers' law" to require collaboration between law enforcement agencies in missing persons investigations and to provide support for relatives of such missing persons
